blocks.name: cznrnglem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ cznrng : The base set of the ring constructed from a ` Z/nZ ` structure by replacing the (multiplicative) ring operation by a constant operation is the base set of the ` Z/nZ ` structure. (Contributed by AV, 16-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm cznrnglem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(czn, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c0, c4))))
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wceq(c2, cfv(czn, c3)))
  3eqtri(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c0, c4)))))
  setsnid(cbs, c2, cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c0, c4))
  baseid()
  basendxnmulrndx()
  fveq2i(cbs, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c0, c4))), c1)
  eqcomi(co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c0, c4))), c1)
}

thm cznrnglem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(Base ` c1)

} = {

  3eqtri(c0, (Base ` c1), (Base ` c2), (Base `(c2[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c4)>)))
  setsnid(cbs, c2, (√ó ` ndx), (s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c4))

  basendxnmulrndx()

blocks.name: cznabel
blocks.content: The ring constructed from a ` Z/nZ ` structure by replacing the (multiplicative) ring operation by a constant operation is an abelian group. (Contributed by AV, 16-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm cznabel(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cabl))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(czn, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, c1))))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cabl)), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cabl), wcel(c4, cabl))
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, cabl), wcel(c4, ccrg), wcel(c4, crg))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, ccrg), wcel(c0, cn0))

  nnnn0(c0)

  crngring(c4)
  ringabl(c4)
  ablprop(c3, c4)
  eqtr4i(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, c1)))))
  fveq2i(cbs, c3, co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, c1))))
  setsnid(cbs, c4, cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, c1))
  baseid()
  basendxnmulrndx()
  eqtr4i(cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(cplusg, c4), cfv(cplusg, co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, c1)))))
  fveq2i(cplusg, c3, co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, c1))))
  setsnid(cplusg, c4, cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, c1))
  plusgid()
  plusgndxnmulrndx()
}

thm cznabel(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí c3 ‚àà Abel)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Z/nZ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c4[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c1)>)
} = {

  sylibr((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà Abel, c4 ‚àà Abel)
  3syl((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c4 ‚àà Abel, c4 ‚àà CRing, c4 ‚àà Ring)
  syl((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c4 ‚àà CRing, c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c1 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  nnnn0(c0)
  zncrng(c0, c4)
  crngring(c4)
  ringabl(c4)
  ablprop(c3, c4)
  eqtr4i((Base ` c3), (Base ` c4), (Base `(c4[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c1)>)))
  fveq2i(cbs, c3, (c4[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c1)>))
  setsnid(cbs, c4, (√ó ` ndx), (s0 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  baseid()
  basendxnmulrndx()
  eqtr4i((+ ` c3), (+ ` c4), (+ `(c4[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c1)>)))
  fveq2i(cplusg, c3, (c4[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c1)>))
  setsnid(cplusg, c4, (√ó ` ndx), (s0 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  plusgid()
  plusgndxnmulrndx()
}

blocks.name: cznnring
blocks.content: The ring constructed from a ` Z/nZ ` structure with ` 1 < n ` by replacing the (multiplicative) ring operation by a constant operation is not a unital ring. (Contributed by AV, 17-Feb-2020.)
